snippet: Mr. Helpern, the chief executive of the business, and his wife, the designer and creative director, built their company into a retail preserve of high-quality, moderately priced stylishness.
abstract: David M Helpern, who led husband-and-wife team Joan & David, dies at age 94.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Helpern, the chief executive of the business, and his wife, the designer and creative director, built their company into a retail preserve of high-quality, moderately priced stylishness.

headline.seo: David M. Helpern, Chief of Joan & David Apparel Brand, Dies at 94
headline.main: David M. Helpern, Chief of Joan & David Apparel Brand, Dies at 94
headline.print_headline: David M. Helpern Dies at 94; He Led Joan & David
